intro: Dive into the game, enjoy the process and open hot illustrations of charming volleyball players!
description:
Welcome to the world of classic puzzles, where passionate, athletic and seductive girls fighting on the volleyball court are waiting for you! Dynamic poses and toned figures of anime beauties in tight sportswear are waiting for you.

Each image is made in a magnificent anime style, and the realistic assembly process will give you the feeling that you are assembling a real paper puzzle. With each level, you will open new images of attractive beauties!

Game features:

- More than 40 unique puzzles with charming volleyball players.
- Realistic feeling of assembling a real paper puzzle.
- High-quality anime illustrations with detailed drawing.
- Relaxing, atmospheric music that enhances the immersion effect.
- The ability to examine each image in detail after assembly.
